channel.title: Who wants to help me make a server?
channel.description: hey im new at this whole moparscape thing and i know nothing about scripting, but i do have some awesome ideas that i would like to give to people and possible be coowners of an awesome new server!!!!!!!!!! :D

item.title: Who wants to help me make a server?
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

item.title: Who wants to help me make a server?
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

VB7 Rocks:

moparisthebest.com/smf

I would like to thank you for not acting like an idiot, unlike the other posters of this thread.

As VB7 Rocks said, Moparisthebest and MoparScape are two different sites. You can use the username and password that you use here to log on, but we ask you to post anything related to RuneScape private servers on MoparScape.org. They have special boards and sections for that there, as well as an expansive memberbase who will be willing to help you get started.

Also, magma was joking about the “pwnd” thing. He is a well known member here on Moparisthebest, and has nothing to do with RS private servers (he despises them, in fact)

Read full topic
item.source: Who wants to help me make a server?
